mapper.select: SELECT att.att_code ,st.store_info_code ,us.member_id ,att.att_date ,att.att_start ,att.att_end ,att.att_todaily_time ,att.att_reg_date FROM tb_attendance_checking AS att LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS st ON att.store_info_code = st.store_info_code LEFT JOIN tb_member AS us ON att.member_id = us.member_id
